price: Сизлардан кўп авлодни адаштирганди-ку. Ақлингизни ишлатмаганмидингиз?!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
